revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Samsung |model=Ubigate iBG1000 |revision=(PCS01E) |asin= |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |availability= |est_release_date=06/2008 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |us_id=A3LDENANiBG1000 |type=T1 router, Router Firewall, VoIP gateway, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel, reverse gender core |pwr_pol=reverse |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=MPC8347E;MPC8347EVVAGDB, 400/266 MHz, QQHE0850, MALAYSIA, 2M12E PLKFQC; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29AL016D70TFI02 |fla2=1 GiB |fla2_brand=Samsung |fla2_model=MM8GF01GWACA-NA |ram1=512 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T511630G-HCE6 |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=SD Card slot |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8721B |eth_chip3_brand=Kendin |eth_chip3_model=KSZ8721B |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=MachXO PLD;Lattice;LCMXO1200;Lattice, MachXO, LCMXO1200C, 4FTN256C-31, A948RR09, MALAYSIA 0946, CK14E52298015;1;,,, Four Channel T1/E1/J1 Transceiver and Framer;PMC;PM4354;PMC, COMET, QUAD, PM4534-NGI (e1), CC0X1970C, A0952, CHINA;1;,,, ATI/ATAPI Controller;SAIN;ATA16V2;SAIN, ATA16V2, D2PMF-010, 0640;1;,,, RS-232 Serial Transceivers (ESD);Marvell (MaxLinear);GT-96124-B1-2;M, GT-96124-B1-2, FQR4891.3, 0924 A2E, TW, C083;1;;TSSOP-20; |flags=SD Card slot, VoIP, |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user=samsung |default_pass=samsung |oui_eth=00:21:4C }} {{TagLine|Ubigate iBG1000 T1/E1 Gateway/Router/Modem/VPN CSU/DSU}}
"CBU-4 EQ41-00084A PCS01E" is etched onto the bottom layer of the board. :Configuration would seem to be via the [https://www.maxlinear.com/products/interface/serial-transceivers/rs232 console port] only.
*The RAM on this device is on-board a removable SODIMM :''[[Samsung]]'' M470T6554GZ3-CE6, 512MB 2Rx16, PC2-5300S <!-- -555-12-A3 --> *The device's firmware is on-board a removable 1GB SD Card :''[[Samsung]]'' MM8GF01GWACA-NA
===PSU=== The power supply included with the unit <small>(at least in the US...)</small> would seem to be a :'''BridgePower''' JPW129KA1200N01 (100-240VAC 50/60Hz, 1A -> 12VDC/2A) The device has a barrel plug w/ a reverse gender core (center pin on the adapter)
